projectGridLines.title: ML and NLP Projects
projectGridLines.description: Machine Learning and NLP projects from Ministry of Tribal Affairs (MoTA) New Delhi. Two (2) positions from any discipline.  Students should have exposure to Python programming. Some background in Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing and Data Science is highly desirable. No CGPA cutoff Students will have to work online but occasional visits to the Ministry office in Delhi and/or Pilani campus may be required. Rs. 25 Thousand monthly stipend.
